Configs.Help-Pin: Use this pin to access protected endpoints
Configs.Help-PublicFacingUrl: How others will access your server. Prefer to use FQDN, if you are hosting a public server. Other players should be able to reach your server with this url.
Configs.Help-PortUDP: Multiplayer Server needs a UDP accessible port specified at PortUDP below
Configs.Help-ServerDisplayName: ServerDisplayName is what will be shown in Server Browser
Configs.Help-IsPublic: Used to decide whether this server is publicly visible
Configs.Help-AutoStart: Used to decide whether Multiplayer server should start as soon as the process starts
